show.title: The Westward Anime Season 1
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/MpBe7S
show.description: The Western Journey is a conspiracy in heaven. After Sutra had been missing for over ten years, heaven decided it must not fall into their hands again, and so it sent its army to Earth. To protect Sutra, the Western Journey began once more.
show.description_secondary: The Western Journey is a conspiracy in heaven. After Sutra had been missing for over ten years, heaven decided it must not fall into their hands again, and so it sent its army to Earth. To protect Sutra, the Western Journey began once more.
